quests.name: Storm's A-Brewin'!
objectives:
(Optional) Visit the locations with indoor rain clouds:
  ‧ Chez Remy.
  ‧ Scrooge McDuck's Store.
  ‧ The Dream Castle.
Take a picture of one of the indoor rain clouds.
Talk to Joy about Sadness.
Collect 10 blue flowers for Sadness.
Give Sadness the blue flowers.

Gather the following materials:
  ‧ 6 Fiber.
  ‧ 13 Softwood.
  ‧ 5 Night Shards.
  ‧ 5 Sand.

Craft some items to help the Villagers open up to you:
  ‧ 3 Tissue Box.
  ‧ Crying Eye Glasses.
Make sure you have the 3 Tissue Box in your Inventory.
Bring the Tissue Boxes to Sadness.
Wear the Crying Eye Glasses.
Visit Chez Remy.

Take care of the indoor rain clouds in Chez Remy.
  ‧ Talk with Remy.
Visit Scrooge McDuck's Store.

Take care of the indoor rain clouds in Scrooge McDuck's Store.
  ‧ Talk to Scrooge McDuck.
Visit the Dream Castle.

Take care of the indoor rain clouds in the Dream Castle.
  ‧ Talk to Mickey.

All of the indoor rain has stopped!
  ‧ Check with Sadness.

Find a rain cloud in the Valley and take a picture of it.
  ‧ Talk to Sadness.
Use Sadness's Tears to upgrade your Watering Can.
Water the sad clouds with your Watering Can in the Plaza and Peaceful Meadow
A Plush Bear Body appeared! Pick it up.
Show Sadness the Plush Bear Body.

quests.name: The Fortress of Saditude
objectives:
ake a picture of potential locations for Sadness's Cozy Pillow Fort.
  ‧ Near Scrooge McDuck's Store.
  ‧ Near Merlin's library.
  ‧ Next to your House.
Talk to Sadness.

Gather the Ingredients to craft Sadness's Cozy Pillow Fort.
  ‧ 8 Blue Star Lily.
  ‧ 8 Blue Marsh Milkweed.
  ‧ 3 Aquamarine.
  ‧ 8 Blue Hydrangea.
  ‧ 20 Softwood.
  ‧ 10 Donald's Fallen Feathers.
Craft the Cozy Pillow Fort.
Place the Cozy Pillow Fort somewhere in the Valley.
Talk to Sadness.

Gather extra pillows from some Villagers.
  ‧ Purchase Scrooge's Pillow from Scrooge McDuck's Store.
  ‧ Ask WALL-E if he has any extra pillows.
  ‧ Ask Goofy if he has any extra pillows.

Collect WALL-E's Pillow and Goofy's Pillow.
  ‧ Fish Goofy's Pillow out of the water near Dazzle Beach.
  ‧ Break the trash cube in WALL-E's House to get WALL-E's Pillow.
Place the extra pillows on the Cozy Pillow Fort.
Meet Sadness at the Cozy Pillow Fort.
Talk to Sadness.
Place Sadness's Pillow near the Cozy Pillow Fort.
Add 5 pieces of blue, purple, white or black furniture near the Cozy Pillow Fort.
Celebrate the making of Sadness's Cozy Pillow Fort.
Plush Bear Stuffing appeared! Pick it up.
Talk to Sadness.
Meet Sadness at the dock on Dazzle Beach.

quests.name: The Big Worry
objectives:
Invite some Villagers to Sadness's talking session.
  ‧ Elsa.
  ‧ WALL-E.
  ‧ The Beast.
  ‧ Remy.
  ‧ Mickey Mouse.
Talk to Sadness.
Make 4 Gooseberry Boba Tea.
Cook 4 Margherita Pizzas.

Gather materials for Sadness's talking sessions.
  ‧ 12 Fabric.
  ‧ 16 Softwood.
  ‧ 8 Black Passion Lily.
  ‧ 4 Purple Boba Tea.
  ‧ 4 Margherita Pizza.
  ‧ 4 Tissue Boxes.
Give the materials to Sadness.
Meet Sadness inside the Emotions' Headquarters for her talking session.
Talk to Sadness to begin the talking session.
The Villagers opened up so much that a Big Worry has appeared! Pick it up.
Talk to Sadness.
Plant the Big Worry.
Water the Big Worry, wait for it to grow then harvest it.
Show Sadness the Plush Bear Buttons.
Water the 12 sad rain clouds scattered across the Valley in the Eastern Biomes.
Talk to Sadness.

quests.name: Create a Bear
objectives:
Locate three Memory Fragments.
  ‧ Outside somewhere you feel at home.
  ‧ A place that connects many worlds.
  ‧ Where Joy and Sadness control emotions.
Return to the Inside Out Realm.
Place the Memory Fragments in the console.
Activate Developer Made on the console using the button on the right.
Use the left, middle, and right section on the console to rearrange your memory.
A Lost Diary Page appeared. Pick it up!
Return to Sadness.

Gather the materials for a New Comfort Bear.
  ‧ 5 Diamonds.
  ‧ 5 Emeralds.
  ‧ 5 Tourmalines.
  ‧ 50 Cotton.
  ‧ 50 Fiber.
  ‧ 30 Dream Shards.
  ‧ 10 Yellow Nasturtium.
  ‧ 10 Purple Impatiens.

Craft parts of the New Comfort Bear.
  ‧ Special Plush Bear Sewing Machine.
  ‧ Framework.
Craft the New Comfort Bear.
Place the New Comfort Bear somewhere in the Valley.

Meet Sadness next to the New Comfort Bear.
  ‧ Talk to Sadness next to the New Comfort Bear.
Add 5 blue and yellow furniture around the New Comfort Bear.
Talk to Joy.
Place the Fireworks near the New Comfort Bear.
Celebrate!
Talk to Sadness and Joy
